thongtin: After 3 years of marriage, the husband and wife divorced because the husband had erectile dysfunction.

After 2 years of marriage, the husband and wife divorced because the husband discovered that his wife had been having an affair with his brother and that their current child was not his own.
tomLuocText: The Truth That Shattered a Marriage

thongtin: After 1 year of marriage, the wife discovered that her husband was having an affair with her sister behind her back.

After 1 week of marriage, the wife decided to divorce because she discovered that her husband was not as wealthy an heir as she had thought.

The husband requested a divorce because his wife was too violent. The wife found out that her husband was having an affair, so she grabbed a knife and hired someone to beat up the other woman.
After one month of marriage, the husband requested a divorce because his wife was too dirty. She only took a bath and washed her hair once a week.
After their wedding night, the husband requested a divorce because he couldn't accept that his wife was no longer a virgin.
On their wedding night, the wife was extremely upset when she heard her newlywed husband call her the wrong name, another woman's name. The next day, she demanded a divorce.

thongtin: The husband insisted on divorcing because the shaman said that his wife was a demon who had bewitched him, always made trouble, and took his money.

Divorce because of being abandoned by their children, each has their own way.
At the age of 60, the husband proposed a divorce because his wife refused to brush her teeth and her breath was too bad to bear.
At the age of 60, the husband refused to die and his wife put poison in the food. After finding out her husband asked for a divorce.
After giving birth, the husband proposed a divorce to his wife because she was too sloppy.

Her husband's lust was too much, causing her to tire and propose a divorce.
At the age of 50, the husband requested a divorce after discovering that he had a serious illness.
After one year of marriage, the wife gave birth to their first daughter, but the husband demanded a divorce because his family did not like having a granddaughter.

After a year of marriage, the wife had an affair with the father-in-law and had a child with him. The husband discovered and requested a divorce. The wife then married the father-in-law, and the husband and wife continued living together and called each other mother and son.
